<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Batch update custom field product associations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/product/update/batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates product associations for multiple custom fields in a single request. This endpoint allows bulk reassignment of custom fields to different products, useful when reorganizing custom field availability across products.

**Prerequisites**:
1. **CustomFieldIds** - Obtain field UUIDs from [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-fields)
2. **ProductId** - Product UUID to associate the custom fields with

**Workflow Example**:
1. Search for custom fields to identify which fields to reassign: [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-fields)
2. Extract CustomFieldId values from the response
3. Prepare product filter value with target ProductId
4. Submit update request with array of CustomFieldIds and product Values
5. Custom fields are now associated with the specified product

**Minimal Required Fields**: Ids array with CustomFieldId values, Values array with at least one EntityFilterValue containing target ProductId

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for updating product associations on multiple custom fields. Used to assign or reassign custom fields to different products in bulk.","required":["Ids","Values"],"properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of CustomFieldId values to update. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchCustomFields","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields","responseField":"Items[].CustomFieldId"},"example":["a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-bcde-f1234567890a"]},"Values":{"type":"array","items":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Base structure for a filter value used in save requests.","properties":{"FilterId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the filter definition."},"Exclude":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, excludes the specified value."},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"The filter value (expression or literal)."},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the custom field type if applicable.","nullable":true},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","description":"Path to the complex editor if used.","nullable":true},"GroupIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Grouping index for OR logic."}},"title":"FilterValue"}],"type":"object","description":"Filter value targeting a specific entity ID.","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the target entity."}},"title":"EntityFilterValue"},"description":"Array of product filter values to apply to the custom fields. Each value associates the custom fields with a product.","example":[{"Id":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","FilterId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000","Exclude":false,"Value":"Technology","GroupIndex":0}]}},"example":{"Ids":["a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-bcde-f1234567890a"],"Values":[{"Id":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","FilterId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000","Exclude":false,"Value":"Technology","GroupIndex":0}]},"title":"CustomFieldProductUpdateRequest"}}}}}
